website_summaries.verdict: A solid alternative to many competitors and the price is more friendly than a lot of others, too.
pros: Better price than a lot of competitors and gets the job done
cons: Taste not as popular as those offered by competitors
100 calories — a bit high for someone using this for energy to exercise

customer_reviews.title: UNLEASH THE BEASSSSTTT
customer_reviews.text: Monster. Either you love it or hate it. It has that very particular jet fuel taste that I have grown to love. Is it killing me? Probably. But not much faster than other things I hope/think. The box this comes in is an absolute beast. It's heavy and almost like a shrine dedicated to Monster. I included a muffin for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It’s over priced they think that you’re hooked on the drink and then gouge you on the price I refuse to pay the higher price
customer_reviews.author: mark breman

customer_reviews.title: Price jacked up
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that the price got jacked up. It was a good deal now it’s better off to go to the gas station.
customer_reviews.author: rifth

customer_reviews.title: Raised the price
customer_reviews.text: Price is up at least 20%. Used to be a good deal. Not now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Boileau

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was awesome till the price jack... I’ll be moving on till it goes down
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Last Case Received was Off
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these plenty of times before because I actually found it cheaper than at my local wholesale store. Unfortunately, I don't think the last batch I received was good. Something was definitely off. Every time I would try to drink one it tasted very different and left a very metallicy taste in my mouth. I found this strange since I've ordered this product several times before and never had a problem. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Its a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for just about $32 in total with shipping and tax and for 24 of them that make them just about $1.30 that really beats the price of $2.25 at the local Kroger on sale. It came in a monster box, Inside of a prime box so there was no way for any damage. It depends on where you live but I got mine in 2 days, If you have $30 then go for it, Its a great deal...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Good ol monster energy drink. Package was delivered nicely and as promised 24 for these cans. If you are buying 24 of these your probably know what monster is. But if you don't for energy drinks its super sugary, like coke or pepsi sugary. I recommend monster on Ice because of this. One monster is your daily limit of sugar by health associations. Just as a warning. You drink this and you will get a mild hangover if you don't treat it properly. This packaging came free of any advertisements monster usually has on its bottles in the store. This is somewhat nice. The classic design is neat looking.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Energy Drink~~
customer_reviews.text: Monster has always been a winner energy drink in my eyes, Just wish the price wouldn't fluctuate so much. I usually go back to Monster when I run out of NOS Energy drinks which is on sale from time to time at my local supermarket. *** Update 5-12-19 *** Ordered new Supply of Monster Energy perfectly packed and all cans intact with both cases. Appears to be the updated cans so I know I'm not getting old Warehouse merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've received a replacement today. And it's the right stuff. Received the wrong product. Just too heavy to try to return.😔
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Holes in cans, can damaged every shipment hereis a picture of shipment arriving today, 10/01/19
customer_reviews.text: I like Monster drinks especially at a good price, but when every month at least 1 can has a hole in it that brings the value of them down. Amazon need to learn how to package them better.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Night workers best buddy
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and the energy provided. I have been working nights for 22plus years and since these came out I have been using them as a crutch to survive night shift issues. They work and I have tried most of the drinks I can. Green monster always wins. My daughter only drinks the white monster. All in all I have literally had thousands of them and keep expecting health issues but my latest physical came back excellent. So much for all the energy drinks will kill you comments. I average three a day mostly and will until my blood turns to sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Monster deal
customer_reviews.text: A 24-pack for roughly $24 is an excellent deal! The first time I ordered they tasted a little weird at first. As if perhaps they had been sitting in the warehouse a little longer than they usually do. But after I refrigerated for several hours they started tasting normal. Since the pandemic started I've been living on energy drinks and back pain and this was a steal of a deal for the former. I've already bought two packs and drink at least one a day. Health is not my main priority.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Horne

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cans
customer_reviews.text: Half the cans are dented and the caps are protruding upwards. Have ordered before without any issues, but this time around recieved a faulty product. Not taking the risk to drink out of damaged cans.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Smith

customer_reviews.title: No high-fructose corn syrup.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason we like this drink is because it doesn't have any high-fructose corn syrup, which is rare for any soda and also still rare for energy drinks. I wish the rest of Coca-Cola and Pepsi would catch on to that point. Anyways, the price is nearly impossible to beat, they taste just like the ones at your grocer or gas-station. I wish I could drink them more, but I read a case about someone in their 30's having severe heart problems which were somehow linked to them, but who knows really, because this seems like the healthiest offering on the market- I mean, it does come Hansen's Natural, which is a company that also sells healthy regular sodas.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Saved Tons of Money by Switching to Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This helped me binge watch all of Stranger Things in just 3 days, so I’d say it’s effective! In all seriousness, I am a one a day monster drinker and compared to gas station or grocery store prices, this saved me so much money! It tasted amazing, I was wondering if the shipping might mess with its flavor or carbonation but my oh my, it has been delish!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: its not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like drinking Red Bull very much but my friend recommended this. The packaging is very good, there is no squeeze, and the taste is good, but the price is very close to the wholesale supermarket near me, so there is not much discount. The first subscription of Red Bull Beverage can still be discount 10 dollars so I also hope you have this event. I think a lot of people will try this drink.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zhang

customer_reviews.text: Overall great buy cant beat the price. All the cans are in great shape and were made two months ago so no exspired cans here👍 but I was a little sad that I didn't get the monster branded box. other than that im 200% happy with my purchase. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: austyn

customer_reviews.title: Original monster says enough
customer_reviews.text: The original flavor Monster energy drink is good. There are other flavors and variations on it, but the original is always good. The thing about energy drinks is that they all pack the same combination of caffeine, ginseng, and "various" to perk you up throughout the day, but not all of them are palatable. The nice part about the original flavor Monster is that you know what you're getting and it's fine. Nothing flashy or special to give it five stars, but reliable enough to give it a solid rating nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Leeman

customer_reviews.title: Monster Energy Drink 12 pak
customer_reviews.text: Package came as advertised. Must've have made mistake and ordered 10.5's instead of 16oz. Doing the math I figured it's cheaper to get the 10 from your local store than to buy this configuration. Also, the 2019 stamped on the bottom of the cans was...2014, 2016 and 2017. Not sure if manufacturer date or expire date.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive, you have to catch it at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this stuff, it's addictive and I don't say that lightly or jokingly. You will actually begin to crave this. For what it is, it does give you a minor burst of energy when you need it. You also have to catch it when it's the right price. Amazon tends to sell this between $27 and $34 a case. At $34 you save ~ $.57 a can vs at $27 you save ~ $.87 a can. This is against the common price of $1.99 a can at the local gas station...your prices may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Fan of monster energy. It has been one of those products that you can always rely on when you need that extra pick me up for those long hard working days that drain your energies. Monster energy gives me that extra boost to make it through accomplish my days goals in a Ice cold refreshing and delicious drink. Monster is definitely a life saver for me and the work I do as well as when Im out on the Trails Riding hard core on our ATV's and on those Draining events at the drag strip. Thanks Monster Energy
customer_reviews.author: Omi

customer_reviews.title: Best. Even comes to deployed locations undamaged.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and packaged very well. Ive ordered plenty of the cases and have had a good experience every single time. Even right now, im deployed and ordered three cases to my APO armed forces address, its packed well enough where a week and a haf of overseas shipping ended without even a dent in a can.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Rolen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at AM/PM a Southern California convenience store chain
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has decided that they should charge more then an average convenience store. $45- bucks a case literally a few weeks ago it was 33- a case and 90ish days ago it was 1.12 a can for about 28 bucks a case. I will not buy from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Atomic Reverend Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Deliciousness Delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Green Monster has been my go-to good morning pick-me-up for several years. I love the flavor, the light carbonation and of course I appreciate a little wake-up energy boost. The price is close to what I've been paying at Costco...difference is I don't have to deal with loading a heavy case of drinks into my car or packing it in from my detached garage. LOVE having my favorite drink delivered right to my front door!
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic provisions!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried going to the corner store every few days to get more Monster drinks when I saw a friend post on Instagram that he had a case delivered. I checked Amazon and got excited! No more life threatening visits to a public space to acquire my favorite vice!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Southard

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and fermented
customer_reviews.text: Half of the case was smashed when we got it. We didnt think anything of it-whatever ugly cans no big deal. When we got to the smashed ones, they tasted disgusting. Flat-old, almost fermented like alcohol. We purchase one of these per week for the 4 adult household. Not anymore. If the seller contacts and fixes this, I will edit my review. Until then we won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather & Cody Aveiro

customer_reviews.title: Good value, smelly box
customer_reviews.text: It's Monster. You either like it or you don't. I don't particularly love the taste, but you aren't going to find a better deal than this for caffeine-sugar-taurine-whatever else-packed green juice. That said, one gripe: the box the package arrived in smelled like crap. Like, you know, the smell really old, wet cardboard boxes get after they dry out and sit in your garage for months? That smell. Didn't affect the product, but mildly inconvenient and gross. Overall, good buy, although I don't plan on buying another box so I can prolong my lifespan a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: The reason I purchased Monster Energy Drinks on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Now, I'm a low energy person. If I'm not working I'm chilling. On a regular basis, I purchase these drinks because they work for me like how coffee works for most people. Can't stand Redbull, so no I'm not even going to consider looking for Redbull. To me, I consider this the best value if you like or need Monster. Overall you're paying $1.40 per can. The only other place I know that comes close is Costco, and they don't deliver. Not only it's a steal, but then it's delivered to your doorstep. Since I don't have a car, this makes my life a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: asianguy2136

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I received these a day after they were to arrive. It was no bother to me. I only had 2 cans that were messed up out of the entire case. They still taste fine. It's a great bang for the buck seeing as how at Wal-Mart here in Arkansas, I would spend $7 for 4 or $17 for 10 cans. I would visit the Corner Store Valero's here when they were priced 3/$5.50 I will continue to buy these from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kagedknucklehead

customer_reviews.title: A great deal buying in bulk
customer_reviews.text: So these cans the 16oz cans sell for $2 everywhere basically and most of America and it might work they sell for $3 and then some places they're $3. If you get this 24 pack from Amazon it come out to about a dollar 31 or dollar 32 depending on your state. So for an average of $1.32 you can't beat the price and they all come together and then I'll last me over a month
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wiles

customer_reviews.title: SMALL CANS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I must not have seen the can size, I didn't even know that Monster made little cans, I thought they were all the same size. These are priced like the big ones, but have a lot less in them than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Missy K.

customer_reviews.title: I'm An Addict
customer_reviews.text: I order these like... approximately every two weeks. A lot of my friends make fun of me like "i can smell it in your cup, let me guess it's monster" but you know what? I'm not falling asleep at my desk at work, now am I ryan? I genuinely enjoy the taste of classic monster, and probably will drink it til I die. I could spend 6 bucks a day at wawa for two monsters, or I could buy one of these and last the whole half-month.
customer_reviews.author: Havik Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really good deal!
customer_reviews.text: If you drink these regularly like I do, buying them one at a time from the gas station or even in a 4-pack can add up fast. Numbers don't lie, and I knew I would eventually drink them all anyway, so for a price of $1.67/can, it was an easy decision. My order came packaged well and intact, and none of the cans were loose or dented. Definitely will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Ganymede

customer_reviews.title: Money saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love monsters. They are like an addiction and have replaced my morning pot of coffee. At the gas station they range from $2-$4 depending on your location. Buying a 10 pack at the grocery store will cost you $16-$18 which averages out to $1.60-$1.88 a piece. With this set you only pay $1.30 a piece and get them delivered to your door! They come in a nice case with no dents or damage to the cans. So far I’ve order 4 cases within the last year and will probably order more! If you are like me and adore a morning monster and saving money, I highly recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Dana English

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price! Lasted me a while! Have purchased 3 times and will continue to purchase! **Been purchasing this item for a while now but this last time I received my package and about 4-5 cans are "deformed" and I'm not sure if I'll be able to open them to even pour in a glass to drink.. They look like they were dropped at some point or squished? I'm not real happy..but this is the only time this has happened out of about 5-6 orders.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, peps me up, good condition upon delivery, never dented or leaking. Shipping box is oddly shaped, not really re-useable so into the recycling bin it goes. If your urine turns cloudy, you're drinking too much, switch to water for a day or two. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Love the product.....Shame they can't keep it in stock
customer_reviews.text: every other time I buy this it's either price jacked or out of stock. Yet the option seller's always seem th have it??
customer_reviews.author: Steve Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Price change loses Amazon customers...
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually leave reviews but felt strongly about this issue. I have been drinking this for over 10-15 yrs as a supplement to my narcolepsy medicine to keep from having to up the dose of the medicine. I am very disappointed at the high price change. I buy a 24 pack a month and stopped going to BJ's due to they were charging more than I could get it on Amazon. I guess I can just go back to buying the case there every month.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Delivery to my area is all messed up
customer_reviews.text: I would love to reorder this product however, for one reason or other it's not allowing me to. My address was just fine and we usually get all orders eventually, the shape product is in is often in question mind you. However, there was no issue with the first order. Is ther e a reason that certain products aren't being able to be delivered to my area??? I'm having the same issus with trying to order Starbucks frappichino.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but is it good for you?
customer_reviews.text: I love monster, but.. After watching this documentary of people suddenly going into cardiac arrhythmia and dying ages 15 - 25 mostly. I have rethought my Monster consumption and will sadly no longer be drinking these chemical filled drinks. As well as any other brands of energy drinks. Please be careful and know what your putting inside your body. when it comes down to it our health is all we really have and it is worth doing the research. Dear Monster inc., Change your formula to organic and create an ACTUAL benefit to drinking these and you'll gladly get my business again. Monster drinker for 10+ years... Good luck..
customer_reviews.author: David/ Manda

customer_reviews.title: Kyle approved!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than getting a 24 pack of Monster sent right to your door! Cheaper than buying at a gas station and much more convenient to have a stock pile. Case came in a pretty stout box and no dents/damage on the cans. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: MachineGunKevin

customer_reviews.title: The 24 pack  came with dented cans and inside boxes  and Monster packaging  were wet
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting mess when I opened The 24 pack Monster Green Drinks, they arrived with dented cans and inside boxes also the Monster packaging were wet and smelly with mildew. I trashed 12 of the dented cans and had to wash the other cans because they were sticky with Monster sticky syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: When you need a boost
customer_reviews.text: These are a life-saver. We have been doing a lot of reno on our house and we have had a lot of friends over helping us out. When everyone is getting pooped out, we hand out some monsters and everyone gets reinvigorated. It's been awesome to have them here at home, ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Sherice B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Packaging
customer_reviews.text: You know what monster is, so ill save your time and review the packaging This came in a cardboard box surrounding all the cans, wrapped like a distributor. Seriously, all cans and even the cardboard was completely unscathed, absolutely amazing. Would buy again. -Acceptable Quality!
customer_reviews.author: Unacceptable

customer_reviews.title: Going from "great" to "good"
customer_reviews.text: I order two cases every month or so. They typically come right on time, very well packed, and the value is undeniable (especially since I live in a very remote area). But 3 months ago 2 cans were smashed and empty, last month 3 were, and this month 5 were smashed pretty badly and two were empty again. It's a great value. I'm just saying: they're getting worse at getting them to me intact.
customer_reviews.author: G.H.

customer_reviews.title: Sooo flat...
customer_reviews.text: The price is right... But the case I received was flat, zero carbonation. I have had the odd can here and there that wasn’t all that fresh, but here the whole case was bad. The cans were well before their expiration date, but somewhere in storage or transport something must have happened - too much heat? Anyway, I’ll go back to buying them from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas M

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and gas!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bulk purchase. Right now these are 2/$5 at most gas stations on sale or $2.98 for a single when they're regular price. Shipped quickly, all cans were intact, undamaged and it saved me from running to the store every few days for a caffeine fix.
customer_reviews.author: Anjelika

customer_reviews.title: Its monster.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really to say, its monster. Go try it from a gas station if you're not sure to like it over any other energy drink. But if you're ordering this big pack you probably already like it. Not sure what it is, but monster and rockstar are the only ones that do anything to help me stay awake with a boost for a few hours, enough time to get my body functioning despite sleeping well. And I've gotten addicted to its "medicine taste'.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanel

customer_reviews.title: Monster
customer_reviews.text: Was a really good drink until the price went up. I will be waiting a while on my next shipment until the price goes down per Monster case. The experience buying with Monster from Amazon has been really good. Kudos for fast shipping and no damaged cans.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma Fan

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing if you like Monster
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! You save on average 20-30 cents a can compared to buying at big name stores. They always arrive in great condition, and securing packaged. This is the 2nd order I’ve gotten of the Monster drinks and they both have been 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste good
customer_reviews.text: It was affordable but the taste is awful. If you only looking for a boost and you don't care about the taste then you can buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Vlinder

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: packaging is perfect and i love monster.. 1 a day before work.. thank you.. i definitely recommend to anyone that wants a bargain instead of paying 3 for 6 or 7 dollars.. definitely get your moneys worth..
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stoyanov

customer_reviews.title: Tasted horrible
customer_reviews.text: they arrived dented, probably from shipping. I drink a can of monster a day, if not two a day. These tasted old. The newer cans, the top tab area has been made different. These had the older tabs on them. That I haven't seen in probably a year. If you want bulk of monster, go to Sam's Club. I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I can make it work but would rather have 8 ounce cans.
customer_reviews.text: I like Monster energy drinks. I just wish Hansen would make smaller Monster energy drinks. You can get 16, 24, and 32 oz cans. I used to buy Monster in 8 oz cans and they were perfect for me. A 16 oz can has way more caffeine than i want. So I put half of the Monster in a recycled soda bottle and drink the other half unfortunately the half in the bottle loses much of its CO2.
customer_reviews.author: Two Bears

customer_reviews.title: Great price!1
customer_reviews.text: When you live with someone who drinks two or three a day this is a great price. Even with a membership to Costco they do not have regular monster and that is all he drinks so this was well worth the buy!Defiantly will be doing again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Saving a lot when buying Case
customer_reviews.text: i bought whole case monster first time in my life :) but i saved i lot of money especially when you buy this product with Amazon Visa Signature card (%5 Cash Back).Fast Delivery with no damage and happiness.I cant say o lot of things about the product because i believe everyone knows about the monster.
customer_reviews.author: Samet

customer_reviews.title: Today's price is....
customer_reviews.text: I can't keep up with the price changes. One day it's set at 27, the next over 33. I have ordered on the low side and noticed I wasn't just buying monster, It was a mirror of the stock exchange. Invest wisely watch the prices, buy low, enjoy while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love the regular monster
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to the regular flavor monster eventually. I do enjoy the other flavors but always end up back to busying the basic. I love the taste, and it is not overly sweeet. It definitely gives me energy too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: A 24-pack Monster for $26.99? You can't go wrong. Unfortunately, the price has gone up now or tends to sell out. If you ever luckily come across it again at $26.99, just buy it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not a shrine to Monster, but...
customer_reviews.text: You know, I read these reviews of the awesome boxes that contained these beautiful, green cans of nectar of the gods, and I was a little jealous. After all, who wouldn't want a shrine to said gods hanging around their apartment? But, I ordered these because at $31, it's like getting 4 free from the grocery store! And, they were in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Monster green great taste great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monster in my opinion and the price is great with the delivery. What more could one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Leeza Rae

customer_reviews.title: Many cans were deformed and bent
customer_reviews.text: About half of the cans I received were deformed are bent like they had been thrown around in a warehouse. Some were hard to open. Overall though they were in date and drinkable so can't complain too much. See attached picture for the the amount of deformation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable deal.
customer_reviews.text: Green monster is my favorite! Absolutely this is amazing deal, the packaging is well packed, but there are 3 bottle damaged, not leaking, just the bottle itself. Maybe during the delivery. Overall, this is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drink! Tastes even better.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this drink a couple times and saw that there was a deal for the 24-pack so I had to get it. Package came well reinforced and the box was very sturdy. None of the cans were displaced or open. Very good tasting drink and helps me get through the day. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Madel

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived damaged and drinks were off
customer_reviews.text: My pack of Monster drinks arrived damaged. The cans were dented and there was even a small in one of them. This batch also tasted weird, not having the signature flavor that I am used to. I am not satisfied with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This the most convenient way to purchase monster. I am happy to pay the price they offer as it is better than $3 per can! I only purchase from the store now when I forget to purchase here. Love it and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my monster
customer_reviews.text: someone in my house drinks monster, and this was a great price and arrived quick
customer_reviews.author: C. perrine

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Monster has never been sold in 10 oz before and it should have been made CLEAR on the page. Very dissatisfied and feel ripped off big time
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Reid’s

customer_reviews.title: CAFFEINE
customer_reviews.text: Drink in moderation. Drank 6 in a hour. After four, I could talk to electricity When I finished the sixth one I spoke with god
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh dork

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Buying monster this way is cheaper then buying the 10 pk at store. I drink alot of monster. Hoping it lasts awhile. Packaging was awesome. No dents, no broken or opened cans. Came in plastic wrapped very thick box.
customer_reviews.author: Smith k

customer_reviews.title: Good product expensive on price
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would drop them down at 30$ after taxes and stuff because it's always fast shipping and never had a damaged or busted can always good quality just a little more than I would like to pay
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Monster
customer_reviews.text: Monster & coffee get me through my day. Monster doesn’t mess around when shipping. Then put a box inside of another box and it’s very tight. Use the subscribe & save from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Connor Wilson

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper with this subscription then purchased in store. Hopefully both cases come at once instead of separate this next up coming next shipment. Other than that worth the price to have them delivered.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy money
customer_reviews.text: Priced the same as cash and carry. Actually better since it was delivered to my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Gentry

customer_reviews.title: price went up, what?!
customer_reviews.text: i have bought this a couple times for my husband. im not impressed by thebprice jump. it was a great deal the first time i bought it. it is still a little cheaper buying it after the price jump but i would rather have paid the first price. it is the original monster 16oz 24pk. just as described and it saves me having to go to the store every week.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with the cans . One might have been a lil smashes but would definitely buy again. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Ca buy

customer_reviews.title: OG is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Cost of the case is much cheaper than grocery stores and it's delivered to my door - what could be better! The original flavor is hands down the best and has a good amount of fizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Price Jacking
customer_reviews.text: They keep jacking up the price. It was worth it before but at the current price you're better off getting it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Feig

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Impressive Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did a really good job with this. The product was packaged in its original packaging along with Amazon's. It was cold, too. I was impressed by this. And it is significantly cheaper than Costco. Breh, Costco straight the fudge up robs people in comparison to this price. Js, definitely would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Always good packaging and value for the money. Been ordering for a while now, this is the first time i ever actually got a busted can! It happens! Could be anyone to blame durring the delivery! I still give it 5 stars over all!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than store
customer_reviews.text: These are for my husband Ron. He loves them but I think he talks too much after he drinks 2 of them. If you could fix that I'd appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: No issues, tastes like Monster, cheaper than local for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to add. You either like the taste of Monster or you don't. If you do like it then this has been cheaper than buying it in the stores. No cans have been dented or damaged, and deliveries through the winter haven't froze. I hope the Ultra Monster prices come down to this level.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine price isn't always
customer_reviews.text: As usual they move the price around a lot on these. Don't love that they do that and at $33 range isn't the greatest deal considering every once and awhile you have to deal with some dented cans that happens in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Daily Drinker
customer_reviews.text: Two of the cans had damaged lids and not sure how they will be at time of opening. Not sure if damages during shipping but hoping all is well. My husband is a daily drinker of Monsters and helps him stay alert during day.
customer_reviews.author: naye

customer_reviews.title: Monster
customer_reviews.text: 4 cans on one side of the box were smashed, liquid poured all over the other cans. I order these quite often, Ive had a few dents in the sides of cans before but nothing like this. Still love monster, will order again... but this was a 1 star situation. (changed back to 5 stars as each user only gets 1 review regardless of quantity of purchases)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Childers

customer_reviews.title: I love the box it comes in
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Red Bull flavor, but I'm not paying premium $$$ for it because I need at least 2 of these a day. Taste-wise it's the next best thing, price-wise it's perfect, and I looooove the box it comes in. I reinforce them with some packing tape and use it for storage around the house
customer_reviews.author: Person with a name

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and gets you going
customer_reviews.text: I buy this because it helps me be alert and when I’m tired it does pick me up and not for a little while. Taste great, especially when it’s nice and cold. I drink this in winter time too. I can’t drink coffee and I would rather drink a monster to get me going
customer_reviews.author: Jrod6

customer_reviews.title: it's monster!
customer_reviews.text: Yep the best value for these if you don't shop at cosco/sams. And free shipping! My ol man goes through 2 a day so this makes it a more affordable habit...
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Monster
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what you get from the store but you get way more for the price! The flavor is great and the packaging is great and very secure during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite energy drink. The monthly delivery is very convenient, one less thing to pick up at the grocery store. And this way saves me some money
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered for a couple of workers that was working at my house they were happy to have them 😊
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor and energy
customer_reviews.text: The green and blue are my favorite. And apparently so are my dad's because the keep disappearing. You guys have to be careful, though, because they have a lot of sugar and you really do get jittery. I don't recommend if you have heart problems or are diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: Anila Cafuli

customer_reviews.title: Dented, damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated. The last 2 times I've ordered the cans were terribly dented - almost every single one. Some were almost impossible to even open. I'm hesitant to order again since it looks like I'm far from the only one who has had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition! I love buying this because the price is worth it. Idk how people are saying it's expensive? This type of can where I live is about $2.40 a can. Or 2 for $4 if there is a sale. So 100% worth it here!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi Dee

customer_reviews.title: "Saves" money
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to buying them individually. My husband says it saves money, but we both know not buying them at all would save more!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly I.

customer_reviews.title: Monster Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried some of these would come in damaged or busted. Nope! Everything was intact and they are delicious as always!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. And Mrs. Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great. Value was even better!
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to anywhere else I’ve seen at just over a dollar per can. Packaging was excellent, very secure for such a heavy item.
customer_reviews.author: marcula

customer_reviews.title: Unleash the beast
customer_reviews.text: Came a lot earlier than expected. There were a couple slightly dented cans. Nothing severe. None of the cans were breached. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: firmit perez

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenience
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient when you only have 1 store in the middle of no where and there monsters are having a funky taste right now
customer_reviews.author: Anderine

product_meta.title: Monster Energy Drink, Green, Original, 16 Ounce (Pack of 24)
product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 24)| *:Energy DrinkTear into a can of the meanest energy drink on the planet, Monster Energy. It`s the ideal combo of the right ingredients in the right proportion to deliver the big bad buzz that only Monster can. Monster packs a powerful punch but has a smooth easy drinking flavor. Athletes, musicians, anarchists, road warriors, metal heads, geeks, hipsters, and bikers dig it- you will too... Unleash the Beast!
feature_bullets: UNLEASH THE BEAST | Tear into a can of the meanest energy drink on the planet, Monster Energy. Athletes, musicians, anarchists, co-ed’s, road warriors, metal heads, geeks, hipsters, and bikers dig it- you will too.
SMOOTH & EASY FLAVOR | Monster packs a powerful punch but has a smooth easy drinking flavor. What does it taste like? It tastes like Monster!
BIG BAD BUZZ | With 160mg of Caffeine in a “Monster” 16 oz can, Monster Energy offers more for less when compared with other 8.3 oz energy drinks.
STOCK UP WITH A 24 PACK | For those looking for a powerful and edgy energy drink to stay in action, Monster Energy is Available in a convenient pack of 24.
Due to new FDA nutrition labeling requirements, product labels may vary from those pictured.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
